nrsimulatr 0.0.2.902

Reference

All functions

entire_census()

Create a set of parameters describing a census of U in graph

existing_params()

create a parameter object for an existing igraph

expected_edgecount()

generic function for getting expected edgecounts

expected_edgecount(<sbm_4group>)

compute the expected number of connections (degree) between two groups under 4-block model

frame_census()

Create a set of parameters describing a census of F in graph

frame_srs()

Create a set of parameters describing a simple random sample of F in graph

generate_graph()

generate a social network

generate_graph(<existing_igraph>)

create a social network from an existing igraph object

generate_graph(<sbm>)

draw a random graph from a 4group_oneparam_simple stochastic blockmodel

generate_graph(<sbm_4group>)

draw a random graph from a stochastic blockmodel with four blocks

hidden_census()

Create a set of parameters describing a census of H in graph

hidden_relprob()

Create a set of parameters describing a relative probability sample of H in graph

imperfect_reporting()

Create a set of parameters describing reporting behavior that is not perfectly accurate

nrsimulatr

network reporting simulations

perfect_reporting()

Create a set of parameters describing reporting behavior that is not perfectly accurate

report_edges()

report edges

report_edges(<existing_igraph>)

for each vertex, compute the number of connections to each block

report_edges(<sbm>)

for each vertex, compute the number of connections to each block

reporting_graph()

make a reporting graph from a social network

reporting_graph(<imperfect_reporting>)

Create a reporting graph from a social network

sample_graph()

produce dataset from a sample of a reporting graph or social network

sample_graph(<census_F>)

Get dataset from a census of F in reporting graph

sample_graph(<census_H>)

Get dataset from a census of H in reporting graph

sample_graph(<census_U>)

Get dataset from a census of U in reporting graph

sample_graph(<relprob_H>)

Get dataset from a relative probability sample of H in reporting graph

sample_graph(<srs_F>)

Get dataset from a simple random sample of F in reporting graph

sbm_block_sizes()

given parameter values for a stochastic block model, compute block sizes (generic)

sbm_block_sizes(<sbm_4group>)

given parameter values, compute block sizes

sbm_census_quantities()

compute network reporting estimates from a randomly simulated stochastic block model

sbm_ev()

generic fn for getting expected values from stochastic block model

sbm_ev(<sbm_4group>)

compute the expected value for various quantities under four-group model

sbm_label_vertices()

assign labels to vertices in a graph

sbm_params()

create a set of simulation parameters for the stochastic block model

sbm_pref_matrix.4group_1param_nested

construct a 4-block preference matrix based on two independent categories, nested

sbm_pref_matrix.4group_1param_simple

construct a 4-block preference matrix based on two independent categories, simple

sbm_pref_matrix.4group_2param

construct a 4-block preference matrix based on two independent categories, and two independent interaction parameters

sbm_pref_matrix()

construct a preference matrix for a stochastic block model
